column4: Zzyber, isn`t application icons on the top bar a better idea than on the desktop?
Choubake: For what? How can one say that.
I did Windows XP -> Debian -> Ubuntu -> OS X on Desktop
So you left us for os x?
I prefer Ubuntu over OS X for working. I gave my Powerbook to my Girlfriend and bought a Fujistu Siemens, P7010
If you hold out for half a year or so there will be Minis running Ubuntu, OS X, and this Windows you speak of.
Well, I won't be buying a computer that soon.
